title: Electrostatic force on three charges in line

content.prompt: The figure above shows three objects (X, Y, and Z) that have charges -4q, +q, and -q, respectively. The objects are held fixed on an axis at the positions shown. The magnitude of the electrostatic force exerted by object Y on object Z is F. What is the magnitude of the net electrostatic force exerted on object Y due to the other two objects?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
